commands.start:
Greetings, {name}!
This bot is created for chat moderation!

errors.pm: This bot doesn't support PM messages. Add this bot to a group with a button below to start using it.
errors.notAReply: ❌ ERROR Incorrect command call. This command can be called only as a response to another user's message.
errors.noWarns: No valid warns detected for this user :/
errors.muteArgNaN: ❌ ERROR Incorrect command call. Correct format: /mute h - where h is amount of hours
errors.notYourMsg: You're not allowed to interact with this message
